You emanate a field of bright light with a 20-foot radius (and dim light for another 20 feet, like a torch). You take a â€“20 penalty to Stealth checks. Any creature that targets you with an attack or an ability must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled] for 1 round. A creature who succeeds at this save is immune to the effect for 24 hours.
